entry.title: Property owner doesn't believe Ahmaud Arbery stole anything the day he died

media:group.media:title: Property owner doesn't believe Ahmaud Arbery stole anything the day he died
media:group.media:description: Larry English, the man who owns the home under construction that Ahmaud Arbery is believed to have entered before he was shot and killed, says he does not believe Arbery stole anything that day. #CNN #News

entry.title: How Covid-19 seems to trigger other health issues

media:group.media:title: How Covid-19 seems to trigger other health issues
media:group.media:description: CNN's Dr. Sanjay Gupta highlights how Covid-19 is baffling doctors, seemingly triggering a number of health issues and mysterious symptoms all over the body. #CNN #News

entry.title: Romney rebukes Trump official for what he said at briefing

media:group.media:title: Romney rebukes Trump official for what he said at briefing
media:group.media:description:
Sen. Mitt Romney (R-UT) admonished HHS assistant secretary Admiral Dr. Brett Giroir for saying the US has done more testing than South Korea because of how early in the pandemic South Korea's tests were performed.
#Romney #CNN #News

entry.title: Trump lawyer argues for 'temporary immunity'. Will it work?

media:group.media:title: Trump lawyer argues for 'temporary immunity'. Will it work?
media:group.media:description: President Donald Trump's lawyer Jay Sekulow made the case for "temporary presidential immunity" before the Supreme Court justices as the Trump administration tries to prevent the president's financial records from being subpoened. CNN's Jeffrey Toobin and Elie Honig give their predictions on how the case might turn out. #Trump #CNN #News

entry.title: Rand Paul says Fauci isn't the 'end all'. See Fauci's response

media:group.media:title: Rand Paul says Fauci isn't the 'end all'. See Fauci's response
media:group.media:description: Dr. Anthony Fauci responded Sen. Rand Paul's (R-KY) statement that it would be "kind of ridiculous" to make nation-wide decisions for reopening the country, especially to suggest that children be kept out of school in the fall by saying we should be careful not to think that children are completely immune to Covid-19 and addressed Paul saying Dr. Fauci didn't have the final word on if states should reopen. #Fauci #CNN #Coronavirus

entry.title: Dr. Fauci: Reopening early could have 'really serious' consequences

media:group.media:title: Dr. Fauci: Reopening early could have 'really serious' consequences
media:group.media:description: Dr. Anthony Fauci tells Sen. Patty Murray (D-WA) that if states and areas reopen prematurely, there could be "really serious" consequences. #CNN #News #usnews #politics #happeningnow

entry.title: Ex-homeland security adviser: Our playbook was 'ignored'

media:group.media:title: Ex-homeland security adviser: Our playbook was 'ignored'
media:group.media:description: Former Homeland Security adviser Lisa Monaco responds to Sen. Mitch McConnell's claims that former President Obama left the Trump administration unprepared for a pandemic. #CNN #News #usnews #politics #presidentdonaldtrump #happeningnow

entry.title: How Fauci and Birx became coronavirus rock stars

media:group.media:title: How Fauci and Birx became coronavirus rock stars
media:group.media:description:
President Trump seemed surprised by the backlash he received when he mentioned rolling back the coronavirus task force, which includes Dr. Anthony Fauci and Dr. Deborah Birx, both pillars of solace for many during these uncertain times. Chris Cillizza explains how the coronavirus task force came to be, and why their popularity may be the reason Trump wanted to get rid of them.
SOURCES AND FURTHER READING: Dr. Anthony Fauci's career under 6 US presidents https://www.cnn.com/2020/04/02/health/gallery/anthony-fauci/index.html
Deborah L. Birx, M.D. https://www.state.gov/biographies/deborah-l-birx-md/
Trump Says He Didn’t Know How ‘Popular’ Coronavirus Task Force Is https://www.huffpost.com/entry/trump-coronavirus-task-force-popular_n_5eb31d4bc5b6fa11e5a1dbf5
Statement from the Press Secretary Regarding the President’s Coronavirus Task Force https://www.whitehouse.gov/briefings-statements/statement-press-secretary-regarding-presidents-coronavirus-task-force/
Trump puts Pence in charge of US coronavirus response https://www.cnn.com/2020/02/26/politics/trump-coronavirus-stock-market/index.html
From cupcakes to candles, you can now find Dr. Anthony Fauci's face on everything https://www.cnn.com/2020/03/31/us/dr-fauci-cupcakes-doughnuts-socks-trnd/index.html
Dr. Birx’s Scarves Are the Surprise Hit of Coronavirus Briefings https://www.wsj.com/articles/dr-birxs-scarves-are-the-surprise-hit-of-coronavirus-briefings-11587742093
Of course you’ve noticed Deborah Birx’s style. That’s why it’s so reassuring. https://www.washingtonpost.com/lifestyle/2020/03/25/course-youve-noticed-deborah-birxs-style-thats-why-its-so-reassuring/
NBC News/Wall Street Journal Survey https://assets.documentcloud.org/documents/6842659/200203-NBCWSJ-April-Poll-4-19-20-Release.pdf
For Dr. Deborah Birx, Urging Calm Has Come With Heavy Criticism https://www.nytimes.com/2020/03/27/us/politics/deborah-birx-coronavirus.html
Trump retweets call to fire Fauci amid coronavirus criticism https://www.cnn.com/2020/04/13/politics/donald-trump-anthony-fauci-tweet/index.html
About me: I was named "best dressed" in 7th grade. That, along with being CNN's editor at large and author of the daily "Point" newsletter are my proudest achievements. Look for me here every Tuesday and Thursday to find out what’s really going down in politics.
CREDITS Writer: Chris Cillizza The Point team: Leigh Munsil and Allison Gordon Editor: Steven Sevilla Producer: Arielle Sacks
Follow Chris on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/cillizzac/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/cillizzacnn Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/chris.cillizza/ Subscribe to The Point newsletter: https://mailchi.mp/cnn/dvgb325pfm
#CNN #Cillizza #Coronavirus

entry.title: Scientists discover llama antibodies could be key to a coronavirus treatment

media:group.media:title: Scientists discover llama antibodies could be key to a coronavirus treatment
media:group.media:description: Scientists in Ghent, Belgium, have found antibodies produced in llamas' blood could be critical in killing off the Covid-19 virus and saving lives. CNN's Nic Robertson reports. #CNNi #CNN #News #Coronavirus

entry.title: Cooper: Trump's testing claim is not and has never been true

media:group.media:title: Cooper: Trump's testing claim is not and has never been true
media:group.media:description: CNN's Anderson Cooper examines comments made by President Donald Trump about coronavirus testing during a White House briefing. #CNN #News

entry.title: Watch Trump's evolution on his Covid-19 response

media:group.media:title: Watch Trump's evolution on his Covid-19 response
media:group.media:description:
President Trump's comments about the coronavirus have evolved since the first confirmed US case on January 22. CNN's tally of cases is based on records from Johns Hopkins University & Medicine Coronavirus Resource Center.
#Coronavirus #CNN #News
